name: Hot Office: Sex Story 🔞
description:
Welcome to the thrilling world of Hot Office: Sex Story🔞 – an adult visual novel where every decision and choice impacts the development of a captivating storyline. Step into the shadowy realm of financial intrigues and risky investigations!

Our protagonist, Tim, has only one goal – to uncover the truth in a sea of deception and intrigue. You are a young federal agent entrusted with your first mission in the new battle against crime. "Dirtle Company", a publisher of accounting services, conceals a murky network of financial machinations and money laundering for Amoretto – the most dangerous drug cartel in the gaming world.

It's up to you to don the attire of an undercover office spy, pick the keys to secrets of "Dirtle Company", and unveil Nicholas Dirtl's grand plan. Choose your path through intrigues, follow the signs, and decide whom to trust and to whom to surrender your secret.

Hot Office: Sex Story🔞 is not just a game; it's a story that values every choice you make. Meet characters bound by secrets, solve intricate puzzles, and personally determine the course of events. Your decisions will shape the ending – whether you can expose the truth or drown in a world of intrigues and deceptions.

Prepare for an exhilarating investigation and incredible challenges in "Hot Office" – where the choice is yours, and the storyline enchants with every twist.

Features:
  • A fascinating story
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
  • Puzzles
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
